arts.ttl: Man City firm up Florian Wirtz transfer interest as Leverkusen eye two players in exchange
arts.sum: Manchester City are targeting a summer transfer for Bayer Leverkusen star Florian Wirtz, and the Bundesliga side would like to take a couple of Pep Guardiola's players in exchange

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso insists Leverkusen won't give up in title race
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso refuses to give up hope of winning the Bundesliga title again, despite Bayer Leverkusen being six points behind Bayern with only five games remaining.

arts.ttl: Leverkusen slip goes unpunished as Bayern draw with Dortmund
arts.sum: Bayern Munich failed to capitalise on title rivals Bayer Leverkusen dropping points as they were held to a 2-2 draw by Borussia Dortmund.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen CEO confident Wirtz and Alonso will stay beyond summer
arts.sum: At the moment, Fernando Carro still expects both Florian Wirtz and Xabi Alonso to stay.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen boss expects Wirtz and Alonso to stay
arts.sum: Florian Wirtz and Xabi Alonso are highly sought-after, but Bayer Leverkusen CEO Fernando Carro expects the duo to be at the Bundesliga club next season. Speaking on Florian Wirtz ahead…

arts.ttl: ‘The current feeling isn’t euphoria’ – Xabi Alonso on the Bundesliga title race
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen had an opportunity to close the gap to leaders Bayern Munich prior to their Topspiel against Borussia Dortmund, but Xabi Alonso’s side were unable to break down a…

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen frustrated by Union Berlin in stalemate
arts.sum: Despite controlling possession, Bayer Leverkusen drew 0-0 with Union Berlin in a hard-fought Bundesliga match, in which the visitors also had opportunities to steal the points. Even in the face of Leverkusen's pressure, Union's defence remained resolute, with Rønnow making crucial saves to preserve the clean sheet.

arts.ttl: Wirtz returns but Bayer Leverkusen drops more points in Bundesliga title race
arts.sum: Wirtz couldn’t return soon enough for Leverkusen, which was knocked out of the Champions League – by Bayern – and the German Cup – by third-division Arminia Bielefeld – while the 21-year-old player recovered from an ankle injury. Bayer Leverkusen star Florian Wirtz returned after five weeks out but could not inspire his team to pick up anything more than a 0-0 draw against Union Berlin in the Bundesliga on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Uncertain future for Tah, but Leverkusen stay ruled out
arts.sum: According to Kicker, Jonathan Tah's agent is still ruling out an extension of the defender's expiring contract.

arts.ttl: Leverkusen inform Bayern of their Nübel interest
arts.sum: In search of a new goalkeeper for next season, Bayer Leverkusen set their sights on Alexander Nübel
